attributes.action: Make it right that both Carlisle United and Swansea play in their domestic League.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is about time that Carlisle play in Scotland and Swansea play in Wales. The main reason is that it gives leeds a better chance of Promotion. I want swift action on this matter.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
